summary:
This is the dungeon from the wiki tutorial for beginners. i used to mod for oblivion but im just getting used to doing it again. I added some other things from the wikis into this dungeon. For my first mod i thought i would try one of the tutorials on the creation kit page.
It is west of riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
This is the dungeon from the wiki tutorial for beginners. i used to mod for oblivion but im just getting used to doing it again. I added some other things from the wikis into this dungeon. For my first mod i thought i would try one of the tutorials on the creation kit page.
Its my first mod but everyone has to start somewhere! It is west of riverwood.
There are a few tutorial weapons in the main room just a test and they should be craft able.
Entrance is just west of riverwood 
it has 6 test rooms: one with storage with leveled items in it one using a nordic kit and a cave kit and just a few more rooms for testing. I will update with more useful things and possibly a teleport spell to it for moving storage. Like i said this is my first mod and i appreciate constructive criticism so fell free to comment with ideas and bugs (i know its floating thats another bug)
I am also working on making it a house dungeon with azuras star rooms and more so its a work in progress.
author: maxisthebest1234
